TopicTitle: can we have a larger limit on private messages?

Articles.Content:
Hi Guys, sorry if this has been asked already, I couldn't find mention of it in a google search thou.

I understand why there is a need to limit the length of private messages but 5000chars is pretty limiting. Whenever someone messages me to ask for help I find I bump into that limit and have to split it over 2 messages. Is there a way that users who have been on the forums a while or have got above a certain rep could be allowed longer messages. perhaps once someone has been here say 2-3 months and not been guilty of any forum offences could they have a larger limit?

Is that even possible? What do you think?
Good question. I don't know if that's possible, but we're currently looking into upgrading the forum version. It may better be left for then.

ooo forum upgrades! Exciting! Well, if something like this could be done when you upgrade that would be awesome.
Bumped it to 10,000 characters per PM maximum.

oh nice one. 10,000 should cover even my long winded ramblings! Thanks for doing that.
